subject: [CRITICAL] Test trusted monitoring on password-locked models
description:
Run Anthropic trusted monitor on existing password-locked model outputs to determine if they evade monitoring. This is THE critical experiment that determines the entire narrative.

Steps:
1. Locate existing password-locked model .eval files
2. Run trusted monitor classifier (Anthropic version)
3. Compare TM suspicion scores vs C3 consistency scores
4. Determine if we have "Monitor fails, C3 works" scenario

**This determines Plan A viability** - must complete before other experiments.

Expected outcome: CSV with TM scores, comparison analysis
activeForm: Testing trusted monitoring on password models

metadata.reason: No GPU available, focusing on prompted sandbaggers
